originalText.text: Harlem Kettlebell Club- an exceptional workout experience like no other. With expert trainers, who empower you to conquer your fitness goals. It offers designed classes that  challenge your strength, endurance, and flexibility. I recommend the Harlem Kettlebell Club to anyone seeking to elevate their fitness game.

originalText.text:
The coaches, the community, the classes - all 10/10, you guys are doing amazing. I am not a traditional ‚Äúfitness enthusiast‚Äù but every time I come in, 1. I want to come in more often and 2. Am so pleasantly reminded of how supportive the instructors are, always encouraging people of all levels in the most positive way. I think it‚Äôs wonderful that the community is so diverse (age, body, race, capabilities), the environment welcomes in everyone and i love that feeling every time I come in.

Also want to give a big shoutout to the unglamorous administrative work ‚Äî from the website, to the booking system, to fixing errors or accommodating requests, it‚Äôs some of the most seamless experiences I have had with gym classes.

I am so glad I made the decision to come in and look forward to many more classes ahead. Congratulations to the team and wish for great success in 2024. Thanks team!

originalText.text: I was introduced to kettlebells before pregnancy and truly enjoyed it. So when I heard about this place opening up in the neighborhood (finally!), I was truly ecstatic. I've only worked out with three of the trainers and they have been nothing short of amazing. They're attentive to form and technique all while being very encouraging. Don't be afraid of kettlebells, you can get in a great workout with them all while building your strength. So definitely check this place out even if you're just curious. Definitely recommend. A Great community too!!

originalText.text: Love this gym! I was looking for a strength-training class in the neighborhood. Every instructor has a different flavor and take with classes, but every class has a fun, positive, supportive, and welcoming vibe. You can pick up wherever you are. The classes do a good job of meeting where you're at, and it attracts a great group of different ages and fitness levels, so you have a blast getting stronger with other folks. The instructors are all knowledgeable and teach you a lot about taking care of your body, proper form, and how to get the most out of your workout. Definitely would recommend this gym to anyone in the neighborhood.
